product.title: 3,4 mm Orange Standard Cable
product.short_description: 3.4 mm standard robot mower cable in orange—ideal as a secondary installation or for repairs. Available in 500m and 800m rolls.
product.long_description: Robot mower standard Cable in Orange – An alternative for a second installation in the same garden. Our Standard Cable in orange is the same cable as our green cable, just in a different colour. Sizes: 500/800 meters. Fits any robotic lawn mower. Use cases: additional installations, complicated installations, 2nd installation in the same garden, repairs, cable differentiation, guide cable.

specs.notes: Same construction and compatibility as the 3,4 mm green standard cable; colour differences help with secondary/repair installations.

pages.heading: Introduction & Overview
pages.text: Robot mower standard Cable in Orange – An alternative for a second installation in the same garden. Our Standard Cable in orange is the same cable as our green cable, just in a different colour.

pages.heading: Description & Use Cases
pages.text: Thickness: 3,4 mm. Cable roll sizes: 500m and 800m (800m fits professional cable machines). Used for installation of robot mowers, boundary loop, search cable, guide-wire and much more. Ideal for additional installations, repairs, complicated installations, and cable differentiation.

pages.heading: Compatibility
pages.text: Compatible with Husqvarna, Gardena, Robomow, Ambrogio, Stihl/Viking, Bosch, WorX, Honda and other common robot mower brands.

pages.heading: Catalogue Reference (EN)
pages.text: See attached catalogue for product family context and available spool lengths. (English catalogue included.)

chunks.heading: Overview
chunks.text: 3.4 mm orange standard cable — same specs as green standard cable; designed for secondary installations, repairs and guide cable usage.

chunks.heading: Specs & Lengths
chunks.text: Available spool lengths: 500, 800 meters. Inner core 1.5 mm²; diameter 3.4 mm; meter-marked; orange color for differentiation.
